data.title: Ugly Duckling Presse: If I Were Born in America
data.text: Chia-Lun Chang is the author of One Day We Become Whites (No, Dear/Small Anchor Press). Recent work appears in The Los Angeles Review of Books, Bettering American Poetry Volume 2, PEN America, Hyperallergic, Literary Hub, Vinyl and 6Ã—6. She has received fellowships and support from Lower Manhattan Cultural Council, Tofte Lake Center, Fine Arts Work Center in Provincetown, and Poets House. Born and raised in New Taipei City, Taiwan, she lives in New York City.
